title: Whole Wheat & Black Bean Pizza Dough
directions: Rinse and drain beans, then puree in a blender or food processor with 1/3 cup water until smooth. Add water as necessary (in 1 T. increments).
Whisk together warm water, sugar, yeast, and bean puree.
Mix together flours and salt, add slowly to yeast mixture (if not using a bread machine, stir as flour mixture is added).
Knead until the dough is elastic, let rise, covered, for at least an hour.
Shape pizza dough on a lightly oiled non-stick baking sheet.
Arrange toppings and sauce(s) on top of shaped dough.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes (or until toppings are cooked through).
ingredients: ¾ cup black beans (about ½ a 15oz can)
1¼ tsp sugar (or sweetener of choice, optional, but recommended to feed the yeast)
